text:
Spotify may appear in Russia this month
01 Nov 2019, 07:44 by Artyom Bausov
The Music Ally resource reports that the Spotify streaming music service may appear in Russia in the first half of November.
At first, he will work without partnership with telecom providers, but with additional features. With which - it is not specified.
Spotify declined to comment on this information.
Earlier, RBC reported that the cost of the subscription would be 150 rubles per month. It was supposed that the service would work in the country in the summer, but the company had technical problems, and the date had to be postponed. [Music Ally]
